alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 1:25AM EST until February 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Baltimore, Carroll and Frederick MD Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
